Report an issue

the rhino framework

rap

The files for the rhino app are below:

fs::dir_tree("_apps/rap", recurse = 0)
     _apps/rap
     ├── README.md
     ├── app
     ├── app.R
     ├── config.yml
     ├── dependencies.R
     ├── rap.Rproj
     ├── renv
     ├── renv.lock
     ├── rhino.yml
     └── tests

rhino package dependencies

rhino uses box, which has the explicit goal of ‘completely replac[ing] the base R library and require functions.’

show/hide rhino dependency tree 
library(rhino)
pak::pkg_deps_tree(pkg = "rhino")

rap dependencies

rhino apps aren’t packages, so the dependencies are stored in rap/dependencies.R

show/hide rap dependency tree 
readLines(con = "_apps/rap/dependencies.R")
      [1] "# This file allows packrat (used by rsconnect during deployment) to pick up dependencies."
      [2] "library(rhino)"                                                                           
      [3] "library(ggplot2)"                                                                         
      [4] "library(shiny)"                                                                           
      [5] "library(extrafont)"                                                                       
      [6] "library(showtext)"                                                                        
      [7] "library(ragg)"                                                                            
      [8] "library(curl)"                                                                            
      [9] ""                                                                                         
     [10] "# load fonts"                                                                             
     [11] "extrafont::loadfonts()"                                                                   
     [12] "sysfonts::font_add(\"Arial\", \"/Library/Fonts/Arial.ttf\")"                              
     [13] "showtext::showtext_auto()"                                                                
     [14] ""
